title: TCL Google TVs pick up a new update w/ performance improvements, April security patch
content:
TCL’s Google TV lineup delivers on great displays, but the software has always been a little rough. This week, though, another update rolling out to TCL Google TV owners brings the April patch and even more performance improvements.

more…

The post TCL Google TVs pick up a new update w/ performance improvements, April security patch appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A fresh update rolling out to TCL's Google TV lineup brings more performance fixes and the April 2022 security patch.
